name: Synth01 - Alpha Demo
description:
Deep Shift Games
http://deepshift.eu/

Synth01 is a pixel-styled 2D action RPG telling a captivating and unconventional story with advanced progress system and character development. Thanks to unique implant mechanics and demanding combat system, this game is not an easy challenge for every fan of extensive action RPGs.

Controlls:
WSAD - Movement
E - Intreract / start hacking
Space - Dash
Mouse - Aim / shoot
